and addr like concat(concat('%',#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select r.R_CODE as rCode from K_KYUSER u join KYROLE_USER ru on u.KYID = ru.R_ID join K_KYROLE r on ru.R_ID = r.R_ID where u.KYID = #{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select m.HREF as HREF from K_KYUSER u join KYROLE_USER ru on u.KYID = ru.R_ID join K_KYROLE r on ru.R_ID = r.R_ID join KTREE_ROLE mr on r.R_ID = mr.R_ID join KTREENODE m on mr.TREEID = m.TREENODEID where u.KYNAME = #{username,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
